rooms.description: spacious entrance leading to the living area and courtyard.
open living space adjacent to central courtyard with large windows for natural light.
functional kitchen integrated with dining area and proper ventilation as per local norms.
open dining space connecting to the living room.
primary bedroom with en-suite bathroom and a small study area; designed keeping Vastu principles in mind for positive energy flow.
secondary bedroom that maximizes privacy and comfort.
attached en-suite bathroom with modern fixtures.
shared guest bathroom ensuring separate ventilation and privacy.
dedicated private gym area with ample space for fitness equipment, designed following safety standards.

openings.description: large main entrance door ensuring natural light and energy flow as per Vastu principles
windows providing ventilation for kitchen and living areas
open courtyard space serving as a light well and social area, designed with Scandinavian aesthetics
